languages.text: {n}Когда вы открываете глаза под вой утренней сирены, Леди-Навигатор поспешно натягивает непослушный чулок на ножку и, увидев вас бодрствующим, испуганно отскакивает.{/n} "{name}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Когда вы открываете глаза под вой утренней сирены, Леди-Навигатор поспешно натягивает непослушный чулок на ножку и, увидев вас бодрствующим, испуганно отскакивает.{/n} "{name}!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}As you open your eyes at the sound of the early watch siren, you see Cassia hurriedly struggling to pull on a stocking that is refusing to cooperate. When she notices that you are awake, she recoils in surprise.{/n} "{name}!"
languages.original_text: {n}Когда вы открываете глаза под вой утренней сирены, Леди-Навигатор поспешно натягивает непослушный чулок на ножку и, увидев вас бодрствующим, испуганно отскакивает.{/n} "{name}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}As you open your eyes at the sound of the morning siren, you see Cassia hastily putting on an unruly stocking. When she notices that you are awake, she recoils in surprise.{/n} "{name}!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}As you open your eyes at the sound of the morning siren, you see Cassia hastily putting on an unruly stocking. When she notices that you are awake, she recoils in surprise.{/n} "{name}!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}As you open your eyes at the sound of the morning siren, you see Cassia hurriedly struggling to pull on a stocking that is refusing to cooperate. When she notices that you are awake, she recoils in surprise.{/n} "{name}!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}As you open your eyes at the sound of the morning siren, you see Cassia hurriedly struggling to pull on a stocking that is refusing to cooperate. When she notices that you are awake, she recoils in surprise.{/n} "{name}!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}As you open your eyes at the sound of the early watch siren, you see Cassia hurriedly struggling to pull on a stocking that is refusing to cooperate. When she notices that you are awake, she recoils in surprise.{/n} "{name}!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}你在晨间巡视的鸣笛中醒来，看到卡西娅正匆匆忙忙地穿上丝袜，却怎么也穿不好。她注意到你醒来之后，惊讶地向后一缩。{/n}“{name}！”
languages.original_text: {n}As you open your eyes at the sound of the early watch siren, you see Cassia hurriedly struggling to pull on a stocking that is refusing to cooperate. When she notices that you are awake, she recoils in surprise.{/n} "{name}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}你在清晨的鸣笛中醒来，看到卡西娅正匆匆忙忙地穿上丝袜，却怎么也穿不好。她注意到你醒来之后，惊讶地向后一缩。{/n}“{name}！”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Als du beim Ertönen der Sirene für die Morgenwachschicht deine Augen öffnest, siehst du, wie Cassia sich abmüht, einen störrischen Strumpf anzuziehen, der sich nach Kräften wehrt. Als sie bemerkt, dass du wach bist, zuckt sie überrascht zusammen.{/n} "{name}!"
languages.original_text: {n}As you open your eyes at the sound of the early watch siren, you see Cassia hurriedly struggling to pull on a stocking that is refusing to cooperate. When she notices that you are awake, she recoils in surprise.{/n} "{name}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Als du beim Ertönen der Morgensirene deine Augen öffnest, siehst du, wie Cassia sich abmüht, einen störrischen Strumpf anzuziehen, der sich nach Kräften wehrt. Als sie bemerkt, dass du wach bist, zuckt sie überrascht zusammen.{/n} "{name}!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Lorsque la sirène du premier quart vous réveille, vous voyez Cassia se débattre pour enfiler des bas qui refusent de coopérer. Surprise de vous voir {mf|réveillé|réveillée}, elle a un mouvement de recul.{/n} « {name} ! »
languages.original_text: {n}As you open your eyes at the sound of the early watch siren, you see Cassia hurriedly struggling to pull on a stocking that is refusing to cooperate. When she notices that you are awake, she recoils in surprise.{/n} "{name}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Lorsque la sirène vous réveille au matin, vous voyez Cassia se débattre pour enfiler des bas qui refusent de coopérer. Surprise de vous voir {mf|réveillé|réveillée}, elle a un mouvement de recul.{/n} « {name} ! »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cuando abres los ojos al oír la sirena de la primera guardia ves a Cassia luchando apresuradamente por ponerse una media que se niega a cooperar. Cuando se da cuenta de que estás despierto retrocede sorprendida.{/n} «¡{name}!».
languages.original_text: {n}As you open your eyes at the sound of the early watch siren, you see Cassia hurriedly struggling to pull on a stocking that is refusing to cooperate. When she notices that you are awake, she recoils in surprise.{/n} "{name}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuando abres los ojos al oír la sirena de la primera guardia ves a Cassia luchando apresuradamente por ponerse una media que se niega a cooperar. Cuando se da cuenta de que estás despierto retrocede sorprendida.{/n} «¡{name}!».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}あなたが朝のパトロールのサイレン音に目を開けると、カシアが急いでストッキングを身に付けるべく奮闘しており、協力を拒む状態だ。あなたが目覚めていることに気づいた彼女は、驚いて後ずさる。{/n}「{name}様！」
languages.original_text: {n}As you open your eyes at the sound of the early watch siren, you see Cassia hurriedly struggling to pull on a stocking that is refusing to cooperate. When she notices that you are awake, she recoils in surprise.{/n} "{name}!"

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたが朝のパトロールのサイレン音に目を開けると、カシアが急いでストッキングを身に付けるべく奮闘しており、協力を拒む状態だ。あなたが目覚めていることに気づいた彼女は、驚いて後ずさる。{/n}「{name}様！」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Nöbet sireninin sesiyle gözlerini açtığında Cassia'nın telaş içinde çorabını giymeye çalıştığını görüyorsun. Uyandığını fark edince şaşkınlıkla sıçrıyor.{/n} "{name}!"
languages.original_text: {n}As you open your eyes at the sound of the early watch siren, you see Cassia hurriedly struggling to pull on a stocking that is refusing to cooperate. When she notices that you are awake, she recoils in surprise.{/n} "{name}!"
